definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

sentences.english: What is the theoretical background of the Formalistic Approaches ?
sentences.chinese: 形式主義批評的理論背景是什麼？

sentences.english: Let me give some brief background.
sentences.chinese: 讓我來簡單介紹一些背景。

sentences.english: Click on the little eye icon on the left hand side of the ‘Background’ layer so it makes this particular layer invisible.
sentences.chinese: 單擊背景圖層左邊的眼睛圖標，這樣能使它不可見。

sentences.english: This paper is based on the project of the huge shield tunnel a cross the Huangpu River, linking East Fuxing Road in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 以上海復興東路大型越江盾構隧道爲工程背景。

sentences.english: Loop quantum gravity is in the jargon background independent.
sentences.chinese: 環圈量子重力學用行話來說，是“背景獨立”的。

sentences.english: The movie is set in pre-war London.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影以戰前倫敦爲背景。

sentences.english: Images of winter trees have no leaves and white backgrounds because of the snow.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的樹圖沒有葉子，而且因爲雪呈現白色的背景。

sentences.english: Research your topic and learn as much background information as you can.
sentences.chinese: 研究你的選題，儘可能多的收集背景資料。

sentences.english: Enables tinting the background that shows through in transparent mode.
sentences.chinese: 在透明模式下，對顯示的背景進行着色。

sentences.english: Under this background, the reform of non-penalization in china is being put on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 在這一背景下，中國的非刑罰化改革也被提上日程。

sentences.english: In chapter two, the background of the Notes of Classical Chinese is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 第二章論述了《古文觀止》成書的背景。

sentences.english: Relatively genetic background of barley landraces were complex.
sentences.chinese: 大麥地方品種遺傳背景相對複雜。

sentences.english: First, context is very important to understanding intercultural communication.
sentences.chinese: 首先，瞭解背景情況對不同文化之間的交流非常重要。

sentences.english: Draw the camera textured with selection wireframe and no background clearing.
sentences.chinese: 繪製帶紋理的相機，帶有選擇線框和無背景清除。

sentences.english: The drifting people of Baekje are precisely produces under this historical perspective.
sentences.chinese: 百濟遺民正是在此歷史背景下出現的。

sentences.english: Assistant directors often have to direct the extras in the background.
sentences.chinese: 助理導演總是得指揮背景裏的羣衆演員。

definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
